text.text_translated:
There are more questions about genes and language. How do genes affect our brain? Did a change in a gene give us the ability to speak?
Researchers found a gene that changed. This happened between 200,000 and 100,000 years ago. This gene seems connected to speaking. It helps our brain control our mouth and face. Monkeys have a similar gene. But their gene did not change. We do not know how much genes affect language. But one day we might find the answers in our DNA.
